In England, in the seven days to 25 March, there were 31,414 new confirmed cases (55.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 March, there were 31,986 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (572 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 March is 3,797,395 (6,746.5 cases per 100,000 population).
